category.name: Project Level Security
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_allow_dba_modify_all_projects
preference.preference_description: Determines whether DBA users can modify all TC_Project objects and the Project Teams, or only the projects in which they are administrators * true: The DBA users can modify all TC_Project objects and the Project Teams. * false: (Default) The DBA users can modify the TC_Projects that they own, and the Project Teams in which they are either Project Administrator or Project Team Administrator.
